data.claim:
SONORA FINAL FORMULA (Principles + Formulas Combined):

CIRCLE SIZES (Golden Ratio):
- Primary: 340px, x=140, y=60
- Secondary: 220px, x=360, y=10
- Tertiary: 140px, x=540, y=80

HERO TEXT (Emphasis):
- "Sonora" 200px at x=480, y=200
- Must be DOMINANT - larger than any circle visually

BACKGROUND PATTERN (Rhythm):
- "S" letter: 800px at x=-40, y=-160, fill #0E0E0E
- "a" letter: 500px at x=1000, y=50, fill #0E0E0E

BALANCE ELEMENTS (Right side):
- Vertical line: 2×140px, x=1280, opacity 0.5
- Dot: 8×8px below line, opacity 0.7

PRINCIPLE AUDIT RESULTS:
✓ Balance (left/right weighted)
✓ Emphasis (200px text dominant)
✓ Pattern ("S" + "a" rhythm)
✓ Movement (circles → text → CTA)
✓ Variety (background + accent elements)
